name: Dubharadh's Folly
description:
Dubharadh was a fair & strong lord in his youth, but age did not bring him wisdom...

This story was submitted (but not shortlisted) as a campfire tale for Inkle studios's game Pendragon.

If you want more like this, here is the full list of those that were selected, and they all sound great!

Many thanks to Inkle for the opportunity, and for making Ink, my favourite interactive fiction writing tool by far.

***
